Homemade methamphetamine, for instance - from the smurfing, it's called, of pseudoephedrine or the buying of over-the-counter pseudoephedrine products in making methamphetamine, a variety of ways that these drugs come to this country.

Well, one, I think there was some concern that some of the messages - although it sounded very smart to us as adults, they actually didn't resonate or take very well with young people.
So we have to be so careful, and the messages have to be so very carefully tested that they don't, in fact, send a different meaning to what the intent is.
